FragilityCurve.Description: Flooring type to be specified by the user. Fragility is based upon fire sprinkler drops in a light weight suspended ceiling, SDC A. User to revise fragility data as deemed appropriate.
FragilityCurve.Name: Generic Floor Covering - Flooding of floor caused by failure of pipe - School - Humid
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: None Import errors: Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3021.001h:DS2:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5

DamageState.Description: Spraying & Dripping Leakage at drop joints - 0.01 leaks per drop, Flooring Damage Descrption by User. User to include mutually exclusive damage states with different probabilities for varying percentages of the total floor area.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace or dry out of the affected flooring materials, equipment and contents. Remove areas that could be affected by mold. Potentially considerable downtime.

DamageState.Description: Drop Joints Break - Major Leakage - 0.01 breaks per drop, Flooring Damage Descrption by User. User to include mutually exclusive damage states with different probabilities for varying percentages of the total floor area.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace or dry out of the affected flooring materials, equipment and contents. Remove areas that could be affected by mold. Potentially considerable downtime.
